welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Pierre-Benite, France! Known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city's beauty and discover all it has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bron Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bron Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at St-Exupéry Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at St-Exupéry Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the LYS_WiFi network and follow the instructions to access.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boutheon Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Boutheon Airport, primarily used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
